body: I know that I am not the only one who misses Luar. Was there a specific reason why it was removed from the rotations? Who else wants to play Luar again?

title: Please bring back Luar!

replies.body: Luar, one of my first DTM maps. You have to stratagise quite a bit in order to win, and on the whole I loved it- But even so, I'm sure there is a reason why it got removed. But I do want it back ^-^

replies.body:
I can tell why it was removed. The map may have been fun, however the islands were too thin and getting shot or knocked off was a very high probability.

I may not want it to be removed but i can understand why it was removed.

replies.body:
The map was good and all, but the bowspam was just really excessive and the games would always exceed 1 hour in game time. If it was slightly edited, for example, make the islands have more width/length, then I'd be willing to give Luar a chance to redeem itself, but I still vehemently oppose it for the reasons stated above.

For those who enjoy the map, I did not mean to offend you, I'm just giving my honest opinion of it and what I think would be a change for the better.
replies.body_tagged:
The map was good and all, but the bowspam was just really excessive and the games would always exceed 1 hour in game time. If it was slightly edited, for example, make the islands have more width/length, then I'd be willing to give Luar a chance to redeem itself, but I still vehemently oppose it for the reasons stated above.

For those who enjoy the map, I did not mean to offend you, I'm just giving my honest opinion of it and what I think would be a change for the better.

replies.body:
I found the map quite enjoyable actually. It was a classic (biased, I know,) and I found that the player-constructed bridges made up for the lack of island space on the map.

And if a remix is made, it better be good.
